about_the_game:
A homage to the arcade twin-stick shooters of the past, Grave Realms has a modern gameplay style that adds unique features for a truly exciting experience!

Help guide your character through numerous, handmade maps with challenging foes and obstacles. Purge the souls of the graveyards to open portals to the next challenge! Find and fight powerful bosses as you progress through the graveyards!

Using the power of the Purge system, you can decide to live on the edge with devastating attack speed, or play it safe with hefty health and strategic use of Powerups. Powerups? Yes! Pickup powerful, game changing potions and spells that can completely change your playstyle without slowing down the game.

A fast and addictive gameplay loop is waiting for you in Grave Realms!
- Go for your personal High Score and show other players on the Steam Leaderboards!
- Track down numerous Steam achievements during your fun and frantic gameplay!
- Your character's story provides a RPG element for your journey through the graveyards!
- The graveyards are full of foes! Fight waves of different enemies with various elemental attacks!
- Conquer unique, named graveyard maps like The Cell, The Gauntlet, The Tombs, The Divide and many more!
- Progress graveyards to fight powerful bosses with hectic spell attacks!
- Open mystical portals to tougher graveyards, but you have to purge your enemies before you can find these portals!
- Finally, have fun! Play at your own pace, challenge your gameplay with the unique purge system, and push for new achievements and the best high score possible!

short_description: Grave Realms is a fast and fun, arcade style twin-stick shooter with RPG elements. Powerups and elemental projectile attacks help carve your way through waves of unique enemies. Using the powerful Purge system, you decide your gameplay style! Can you survive the Grave Realms?
